cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You can't look directly at me.

cosmos.question: I'm round and you live here. I have land and water. What am I?
I come out at night, and I'm round and white. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am very, very far away, twinkling and bright. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am in the night sky.
✨ I look small but I am really big.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that gives off light and heat and the Earth goes around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 The Earth goes around me once a year.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars. What am I called?
I am a group of planets that go around the Sun. What am I called?

hints.text: ☀️ I have a star at the center.
🚀 You need rockets to visit the planets in me.

cosmos.question: I am a big space rock that sometimes comes close to Earth. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can leave a fiery trail.
💥 I can make a big hole if I hit the ground.
🪨 I am made of rock and ice.

cosmos.question: I am the closest planet to the Sun. I am very hot and rocky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 It is very hard to live on me.
🚀 I am the first planet you would pass if you travelled from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us look like bears.
✨ We are easy to see at night.
🔭 You can find me with a telescope

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?
I float on the water and carry people. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I can have a big sail.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you can pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦶 You use your feet to make me go.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
👩‍🦽 You can wear a helmet when riding me.

transport.question: I go choo-choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I carry lots of people at once.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can fly above the clouds.
✈️ I take people to far away places.

transport.question: I take lots of people to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt very fast. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a special light on top.
🚨 I make a loud noise to warn people.
🧑‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses sometimes ride in me.

transport.question: I can fly to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very big and fast.

transport.question: I carry things across the ocean, I am bigger than a boat. What am I?
I travel under the ground and carry people very fast in cities. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 You can find me in big cities
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Lots of people can fit inside
